verses.text_plain: Better is a dry morsel, and quietness therewith, than an house full of sacrifices with strife.
verses.verse_html:
1Better is a dry morsel, and quietness therewith, than an house full of sacrifices with strife. ▼
▼ sacrifices: or, good cheer

footnotes.body_html: ▼ sacrifices: or, good cheer

verses.text_plain: A wise servant shall have rule over a son that causeth shame, and shall have part of the inheritance among the brethren.
verses.verse_html: 2A wise servant shall have rule over a son that causeth shame, and shall have part of the inheritance among the brethren.

verses.text_plain: The fining pot is for silver, and the furnace for gold: but the Lord trieth the hearts.
verses.verse_html: 3The fining pot is for silver, and the furnace for gold: but the Lord trieth the hearts.

verses.text_plain: A wicked doer giveth heed to false lips; and a liar giveth ear to a naughty tongue.
verses.verse_html: 4A wicked doer giveth heed to false lips; and a liar giveth ear to a naughty tongue.

verses.text_plain: Whoso mocketh the poor reproacheth his Maker: and he that is glad at calamities shall not be unpunished.
verses.verse_html:
5Whoso mocketh the poor reproacheth his Maker: and he that is glad at calamities shall not be unpunished. ▼
▼ unpunished: Heb. held innocent

footnotes.body_html: ▼ unpunished: Heb. held innocent

verses.text_plain: Children’s children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.
verses.verse_html: 6Children’s children are the crown of old men; and the glory of children are their fathers.

verses.text_plain: Excellent speech becometh not a fool: much less do lying lips a prince.
verses.verse_html:
7Excellent speech becometh not a fool: much less do lying lips a prince. ▼
▼ Excellent…: Heb. A lip of excellency
 , ▼
▼ lying…: Heb. a lip of lying

footnotes.body_text: ▼ Excellent…: Heb. A lip of excellency
footnotes.body_html: ▼ Excellent…: Heb. A lip of excellency

footnotes.body_text: ▼ lying…: Heb. a lip of lying
footnotes.body_html: ▼ lying…: Heb. a lip of lying

verses.text_plain: A gift is as a precious stone in the eyes of him that hath it: whithersoever it turneth, it prospereth.
verses.verse_html:
8A gift is as a precious stone in the eyes of him that hath it: whithersoever it turneth, it prospereth. ▼
▼ a precious…: Heb. a stone of grace

footnotes.body_text: ▼ a precious…: Heb. a stone of grace
footnotes.body_html: ▼ a precious…: Heb. a stone of grace

verses.text_plain: He that covereth a transgression seeketh love; but he that repeateth a matter separateth very friends.
verses.verse_html:
9He that covereth a transgression seeketh love; but he that repeateth a matter separateth very friends. ▼
▼ seeketh: or, procureth

verses.text_plain: A reproof entereth more into a wise man than an hundred stripes into a fool.
verses.verse_html:
10A reproof entereth more into a wise man than an hundred stripes into a fool. ▼
▼ entereth…: or, aweth more a wise man, than to strike a fool an hundred times

footnotes.body_text: ▼ entereth…: or, aweth more a wise man, than to strike a fool an hundred times
footnotes.body_html: ▼ entereth…: or, aweth more a wise man, than to strike a fool an hundred times

verses.text_plain: An evil man seeketh only rebellion: therefore a cruel messenger shall be sent against him.
verses.verse_html: 11An evil man seeketh only rebellion: therefore a cruel messenger shall be sent against him.

verses.text_plain: Let a bear robbed of her whelps meet a man, rather than a fool in his folly.
verses.verse_html: 12Let a bear robbed of her whelps meet a man, rather than a fool in his folly.

verses.text_plain: Whoso rewardeth evil for good, evil shall not depart from his house.
verses.verse_html: 13Whoso rewardeth evil for good, evil shall not depart from his house.

verses.text_plain: The beginning of strife is as when one letteth out water: therefore leave off contention, before it be meddled with.
verses.verse_html: 14The beginning of strife is as when one letteth out water: therefore leave off contention, before it be meddled with.

verses.text_plain: He that justifieth the wicked, and he that condemneth the just, even they both are abomination to the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 15He that justifieth the wicked, and he that condemneth the just, even they both are abomination to the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore is there a price in the hand of a fool to get wisdom, seeing he hath no heart to it?
verses.verse_html: 16Wherefore is there a price in the hand of a fool to get wisdom, seeing he hath no heart to it?

verses.text_plain: A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.
verses.verse_html: 17A friend loveth at all times, and a brother is born for adversity.

verses.text_plain: A man void of understanding striketh hands, and becometh surety in the presence of his friend.
verses.verse_html:
18A man void of understanding striketh hands, and becometh surety in the presence of his friend. ▼
▼ understanding: Heb. heart

verses.text_plain: He loveth transgression that loveth strife: and he that exalteth his gate seeketh destruction.
verses.verse_html: 19He loveth transgression that loveth strife: and he that exalteth his gate seeketh destruction.

verses.text_plain: He that hath a froward heart findeth no good: and he that hath a perverse tongue falleth into mischief.
verses.verse_html:
20He that hath a froward heart findeth no good: and he that hath a perverse tongue falleth into mischief. ▼
▼ He that hath a froward…: Heb. The froward of heart

tokens.text: and he that hath a perverse

footnotes.body_text: ▼ He that hath a froward…: Heb. The froward of heart
footnotes.body_html: ▼ He that hath a froward…: Heb. The froward of heart

verses.text_plain: He that begetteth a fool doeth it to his sorrow: and the father of a fool hath no joy.
verses.verse_html: 21He that begetteth a fool doeth it to his sorrow: and the father of a fool hath no joy.

verses.text_plain: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
verses.verse_html:
22A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones. ▼
▼ like: or, to

verses.text_plain: A wicked man taketh a gift out of the bosom to pervert the ways of judgment.
verses.verse_html: 23A wicked man taketh a gift out of the bosom to pervert the ways of judgment.

verses.text_plain: Wisdom is before him that hath understanding; but the eyes of a fool are in the ends of the earth.
verses.verse_html: 24Wisdom is before him that hath understanding; but the eyes of a fool are in the ends of the earth.

verses.text_plain: A foolish son is a grief to his father, and bitterness to her that bare him.
verses.verse_html: 25A foolish son is a grief to his father, and bitterness to her that bare him.

verses.text_plain: Also to punish the just is not good, nor to strike princes for equity.
verses.verse_html: 26Also to punish the just is not good, nor to strike princes for equity.

verses.text_plain: He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit.
verses.verse_html:
27He that hath knowledge spareth his words: and a man of understanding is of an excellent spirit. ▼
▼ an…: or, a cool

footnotes.body_html: ▼ an…: or, a cool

verses.text_plain: Even a fool, when he holdeth his peace, is counted wise: and he that shutteth his lips is esteemed a man of understanding.
verses.verse_html: 28Even a fool, when he holdeth his peace, is counted wise: and he that shutteth his lips is esteemed a man of understanding.
